hostname ePE_B
buggy

logging syslog informational local7 172.20.20.1
!
crypto rsakey rsa import $v10$

crypto dsakey dsa import $v10$
!
crypto ecdsakey ecdsa import $v10$TUhNQ0FRRUVIMWVGcXZmTSsrcWFwTHhWaXhtaWgyZHRhVUk3dVY2QllTZSt4MGl1MUxhZ0J3WUZLNEVFQUFxaFJBTkNBQVFrYllaZlUrd0tQK1ZodnVJYk5HMGE3NzB4VzFTVS9iMXJocHFoSnZpT3hlVnI3bllhRTJRMTBJc1NkWW1tamVuKzU0QnNKVUd2TmlBU0ZudlplQk0z

aaa userlist usr
 username rare
 username rare password $v10$cmFyZQ==
 exit

scheduler errors
 time 600000
 delay 30000
 command clear errors freerror@nop.hu
 start
 exit
!
access-list custB_Filter
 sequence 10 permit all 100.50.81.0 255.255.255.248 all any all
 sequence 20 deny all any all any all
 exit
!
prefix-list ALL4
 sequence 10 permit 0.0.0.0/0 ge 0 le 0
 exit
!
prefix-list ALL6
 sequence 10 permit ::/0 ge 0 le 0
 exit
!
bundle 17
 exit
!
bundle 18
 exit
!
bundle 30
 exit
!
vrf definition DEF_SEGROUT
 rd 200:2
 rt4import 200:200
 rt4export 200:200
 rt6import 200:200
 rt6export 200:200
 exit
!
vrf definition OOB
 exit
!
router ospf4 10
 vrf DEF_SEGROUT
 router-id 122.200.200.2
 traffeng-id 0.0.0.0
 segrout 500 base 12000
 area 0 enable
 area 0 spf-ecmp
 area 0 segrout
 ecmp
 exit
!
interface loopback1
 vrf forwarding DEF_SEGROUT
 ipv4 address 122.200.200.2 255.255.255.255
 router ospf4 10 enable
 router ospf4 10 area 0
 router ospf4 10 passive
 router ospf4 10 segrout index 315
 router ospf4 10 segrout node
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface bundle17
 description eASBR1
 vrf forwarding DEF_SEGROUT
 ipv4 address 20.200.136.2 255.255.255.252
 mpls enable
 router ospf4 10 enable
 router ospf4 10 area 0
 router ospf4 10 cost 700
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface bundle18
 description eASBR2
 vrf forwarding DEF_SEGROUT
 ipv4 address 20.200.136.6 255.255.255.252
 mpls enable
 router ospf4 10 enable
 router ospf4 10 area 0
 router ospf4 10 cost 700
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface bundle30
 description eCE_B
 vrf forwarding DEF_SEGROUT
 ipv4 address 100.50.81.6 255.255.255.252
 ipv4 access-group-out custB_Filter
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface ethernet1
 description [B30]eCE_B
 bundle-group 30
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface ethernet2
 description [B17]eASBR1_eth2
 cdp enable
 bundle-group 17
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface ethernet255
 description MGMT
 vrf forwarding OOB
 ipv4 address 172.20.20.11 255.255.255.0
 no shutdown
 no log-link-change
 exit
!
interface ethernet3
 description [B18]eASBR2_eth2
 cdp enable
 bundle-group 18
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
router bgp4 17000
 vrf DEF_SEGROUT
 local-as 17000
 router-id 122.200.200.2
 address-family labeled vpnuni
 !
 template BGP-LU remote-as 17000
 template BGP-LU local-as 17000
 template BGP-LU address-family labeled vpnuni
 template BGP-LU distance 200
 template BGP-LU additional-path-rx labeled vpnuni
 template BGP-LU additional-path-tx labeled vpnuni
 template BGP-LU update-source loopback1
 template BGP-LU segrout
 !
 neighbor 122.200.200.100 template BGP-LU
 !
 neighbor 122.200.200.200 template BGP-LU
 !
 !
 redistribute connected
 exit
